testcase.name: contributing guide exists when referenced()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: README references contributing but no CONTRIBUTING.md found in: [CONTRIBUTING.md, docs/CONTRIBUTING.md] ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>
